attributes.action: Open a public inquiry into the implementation and structure of Modernising Medical Careers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is widepsread belief that the publically financed MMC and MTAS process has been poorly designed and implemented. A public inquiry is necessary to properly investigate these concerns and provide satisfactory independent answers to the serious concerns raised by thousands of junior doctors.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
